napplet
Class Nibblet

java.lang.Object
  napplet.NitBase
      napplet.Nibblet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Nit, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
Box
public class Nibblet
extends NitBase

Nit implementation that draws directly on its parent's display space.

Author:
acsmith
